title: OTP not received
recommended_action: Resend OTP or ask user to check spam folder.

title: Mobile app slow or crashing
recommended_action: Ask user to update app; escalate to mobile team if persists.

title: Website not loading
recommended_action: Check server logs; escalate to backend team.

title: Refund delay
recommended_action: Check payment logs; escalate to finance team.

title: Order tracking issue
recommended_action: Ask courier service or escalate to operations.

title: Profile update failed
recommended_action: Ask user to retry; escalate to backend team if persists.

title: Notification missing
recommended_action: Check notification system; escalate to dev team if needed.

title: Subscription auto-renew issue
recommended_action: Check subscription logs; contact finance team.

title: Dashboard loading slowly
recommended_action: Check server performance; escalate to backend team.

title: File upload error
recommended_action: Ask user to retry; escalate to backend team if persists.

title: Email verification failure
recommended_action: Resend verification email or ask user to check spam folder.
